source:
%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_absences

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Abs_Type,
    Sickness_Group,
    Start_Date,
    End_Date,
    Attendance_or_Absence_Type,
    Days,
    Hrs,
    Start,
    End_time,
    Cal_days,
    Work_Schedule_Rule,
    Wk_Hrs,
    Hrs_Day,
    WkDys,
    Annual_Leave_Start,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.absences_new

%%sql   

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_standardised_db.vw_addresses

AS

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 5
        THEN CONCAT('00',Staff_Number)
        WHEN LENGTH(Staff_Number) = 6 AND SUBSTR(Staff_Number,1,1) = 4
        THEN CONCAT('50',Staff_Number)        
        ELSE Staff_Number
    END as Staff_Number,
    Street_and_House_Number,
    `2nd_Address_Line`,
    City,
    District,
    Postal_Code,
    Region_State_Province_Count,
    Start_Date,
    End_Date,
    Charting_Officer,
    Charting_Officer_for_Inspector,
    Subs_PS_Group,
    Tel_No,
    Personal_Mobile,
    Work_Mobile,
    Chngd_on,
    ingested_datetime,
    expected_from,
    expected_to

FROM odw_standardised_db.addresses_new
